refsect2.title: The “append-header” signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (AgsMidiBuilder *midi_builder, guint offset, guint format, guint track_count, guint division, guint times, guint bpm, guint clicks, gpointer user_data)
refsect2.para: The ::append-header signal is emited during building of header.

user data set when the signal handler was connected.
